Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sansi Diputacio Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Francisco Godia Foundation and minutes from Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Sagrada Familia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 55 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is Noon
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

With a stay at Sansi Diputacio Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Francisco Godia Foundation and minutes from Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Sagrada Familia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Francisco Godia Foundation - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
University of Barcelona - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Placa Universitat - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Casa Lleo-Morera - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Casa Amatller - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Fundacio Antoni Tapies - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Casa Batllo - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museu del Perfume - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Bulevard Rosa - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Placa de Catalunya - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Tivoli Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Centre de Cultura Contemporania de Barcelona - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Barcelona Egyptian Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Casa Mila - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Sansi Diputacio Hotel is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 12 km / 7.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
